name: opentalk
description: OpenTalk is a self-hosted video conferencing solution built with privacy-first principles. It includes meeting rooms, screen sharing, chat, and customizable deployment via Docker and Kubernetes.
features: Video Conferencing: Host secure video meetings with HD quality, noise cancellation, and bandwidth optimization.
Privacy First: Self-hosted solution ensuring complete control over meeting data and participant information.
Screen Sharing: Share entire screens or specific applications with high-quality streaming and annotation tools.
Chat Integration: Built-in text chat with file sharing, emoji reactions, and message history during meetings.
Meeting Rooms: Create persistent virtual rooms with custom settings, access controls, and recurring schedules.
Recording Capabilities: Record meetings locally with automatic transcription and searchable content indexing.
Mobile Support: Join meetings from smartphones and tablets with full feature parity and optimized interfaces.
Breakout Rooms: Split large meetings into smaller groups with automatic or manual participant assignment.
Whiteboard Tools: Collaborate on shared whiteboards with drawing tools, shapes, and real-time synchronization.
Calendar Integration: Connect with existing calendar systems for automatic meeting scheduling and reminders.
Custom Branding: Apply organization logos, themes, and custom domains for professional meeting experiences.
API Access: Integrate with external systems through REST APIs for automated meeting management and analytics.
